title.rendered: Pacom Contactless Digital Medical Grade Infrared Forehead Thermometer

content.rendered:
This Innovative modern LED infrared medical thermometer is the perfect product for medical professionals, businesses and families who want quality and accuracy. It measures the body temperature based on detecting the infrared energy emitted from the eardrum or the forehead and provides fast non-contact forehead temperature measurements.
 The LED infrared medical thermometer reads temperatures quickly and accurately and has an easy access forehead mode at a click of a singular button for people above three months old. Users can quickly get measurement results by using our thermometer and can easily be used for consecutive testing with only a few seconds to wait between tests to ensure accurate measurements.
Product Name Medical Infrared Thermometer
Model PC828/PC828EV
Power Supply DC 3.0V (X AAA batteries) Batteries not included
Low battery Indicator Appears on the screen when the voltage is below 2.6V±0.1V
Measurement modes Forehead and room temperature mode
Measurement time 1 second
Temperature units °C and °F (convertible)
Measurement range 32.0-43.0°C(89.6-109.4°F)
Accuracy
  • 35.0-42.0°C(95.0-107.6°F)±0.2C/0.4°F
  • Other ranges±0.3°C/0.5°F
Distance 3-5CM
Main Function
  • Human Forehead, Surface Temp measuring
  • Back light, 3 colour (Green, Orange, red) and single colour to select
  • 32 saved readings
  • Back light
  • Fever alarm (over 38°C, red light)
  • Low Batteries alarm
  • Auto shut off
  • Celsius/Fahrenheit conversant
Life 5 years
Response time Only 1 sec
Material Shell: Anti-bacterial ABS
Battery
  • One 3.0V included
  • 2 PCS AAA Replaceable
Certifications  TGA Approved, FDA, CE

AARTG: 340559

excerpt.rendered:
